reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater trendy and perfect for fall and winter, appreciating its softness and nice colors. Moreover, the quality is good, and they like how it pairs with collared shirts. However, the size and fit receive mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others say it runs a little big. Additionally, the fabric quality is also mixed, with some praising the material while others note it's not 80% co

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find!
items.body: Fits perfect. Olive&camel looks wonderful. Read more
items.author: Shopper Sam

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: This vest is mostly great - comfortable, well made, very cute and flattering, it’s not flimsy and cheap but nice and thick, but it does have one issue. The fold lines from when it was shipped will NOT wash out. I’ve tried stretching them out and flattening them while the best it wet and letting it dry that way but it doesn’t help. The creases are as clear and crisp as the day I opened it, despite having worn and washed it several times. Other than that, it’s very cute and perfect for work. Read more
items.author: K80something

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was a nice outfit but too big for me. I will just reorder next time.
items.body: Please let me cancel return and decided to just give it away to a cousin. I was trying to contact Seller but my written message at the chatbox cannot send out. So I will just do it here. Thank u and my apology. Read more
items.author: Josephin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a summer weight sweater
items.body: This is a thick sweater. I didn’t like the big open stitches, and I thought it would be more of a summer weight thickness. Sizing was ok, but not really flattering since my gut sticks out more than I’d like. I thought the side slits would help hide it but the sweater was on the narrower side. I’ll be returning it. Read more
items.author: lploschke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Something for Layering, Worked Out- So Got Two
items.body: I first ordered this vest in the green color and then I also got the red one (the colors were nice & bright)--and I happen to like the argyle design. I ordered my usual size, a medium, as I usually wear an 8-10 and the vest fit fine (for reference I am 5' 6" and a 36 B). I have a small medium type frame and it was okay no riding up or bunching of the sweater. Of course everyone has different sizing and/or style preferences (I have ordered enough clothes to see that). It is kind of a relaxed fit not body skimming but I just wanted something mainly for casual wear that would comfortably fit over a turtleneck or shirt and to wear with jeans or a denim skirt. It fit the purpose. I have worn the vests and the material has a nice weight and feel. The vest is a little longer in the back than the front which is okay because it gives a little more backside coverage. It makes a good addition to my fall and winter wardrobe. When I wash it I use a gentle liquid detergent, blot it dry and let it dry out naturally. I am okay with my purchases. Read more
items.author: RLH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: This vest is exactly as described. Love it. Get tons of compliments on it. True to size. Design is not on the back if that matters to you. Read more
items.author: Shelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Nice - Loose Fit
items.author: Lora

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Pink, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Royal Blue, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
